content: this is a great textured and fun washcloth/dishcloth pattern that you can make with any cotton or cotton blend yarn it only takes up a small amount of yarn 60-70 yards or less and should be pretty quick to knit the stitch may look intimidating but actually it is very simple only knits and purls *yarn * peaches & cream stripey in color evening sea or any cotton or cotton blend dk/light worsted weight yarn you will need only 60-70 yards or less for this project *needles * size 4 us 3 50 mm circular or straight knitting needles *gauge * 4 5 stitches and 8 row over 1 inch in stitch pattern the gauge actually does not matter much unless you would like your project to be the exact same size as mine is in the sample photos thank you simplestitchesdesigns 2024
